name: Gacha Impact 2D
description:
A simple Gacha game (with auto-save feature!) made by me and my friend MonsterPocky for Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2021 

Remember that the best things might not always come from gold things

Can you get all 32 collectible items?

Controls:
You can use either your Mouse or Keyboard - Standard arrow key plus the usual Enter and Escape/Backspace

(You can replay the typing game by pressing [tab] without having to click the replay button)

Assets Credit:
